creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
life_date: Utagawa Hiroshige, Japanese, 1797 – 1858; Fujiokaya Hikotarō, Publisher, Japanese
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Collection of Famous Restaurants in Edo (Edo kōmei kaitei zukushi 江戸高名会亭尽)
text: The customer seated on the left who is playing the popular parlor game ken with a woman is believed to be the artist Hiroshige himself, who seems to be indicating that he was actively going to famous restaurants as well.
title: Ushijima: Musashiya Restaurant
